attributes.action: government ripping off disabled people on esa how are we going to survive
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to stop the witch hunt on disabled people. The genuine ones are not fit to work and working for most of them will make their quality of life worse not better the DWP cant find work for the able bodied unemployed because THERE IS NONE. so leave disabled people alone ESA IS FOR ! YEAR AFTER THAT DO WE STARVE ON THE STREETS AND DIE BECAUSE THERE IS NO OTHER WAY TO SUPPORT OURSELVES PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION
